mapper.update:
update task
task_name = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_parent_id = #{taskParentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
demand_id = #{demandId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
priority = #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assign_user_id = #{assignUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
beassign_user_id = #{beassignUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assign_time = #{assignTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
estimate_start_time = #{estimateStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
estimate_end_time = #{estimateEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
actual_start_time = #{actualStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
actual_end_time = #{actualEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
task_type = #{taskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_speed = #{taskSpeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
abnormal_status = #{abnormalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_describe = #{taskDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
abnormal_describe = #{abnormalDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
estimate_hour = #{estimateHour,jdbcType=INTEGER},
consume_hour = #{consumeHour,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remain_hour = #{remainHour,jdbcType=INTEGER},
task_mileage = #{taskMileage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
warning_hour = #{warningHour,jdbcType=INTEGER},
warning_status = #{warningStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filepath = #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Column_1 = #{column1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Column_2 = #{column2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Column_3 = #{column3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Column_4 = #{column4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Column_5 = #{column5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update task set task_name = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_parent_id = #{taskParentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, demand_id = #{demandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assign_user_id = #{assignUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, beassign_user_id = #{beassignUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assign_time = #{assignTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, estimate_start_time = #{estimateStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, estimate_end_time = #{estimateEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, actual_start_time = #{actualStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, actual_end_time = #{actualEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, task_type = #{taskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_speed = #{taskSpeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, abnormal_status = #{abnormalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_describe = #{taskDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, abnormal_describe = #{abnormalDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, estimate_hour = #{estimateHour,jdbcType=INTEGER}, consume_hour = #{consumeHour,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remain_hour = #{remainHour,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_mileage = #{taskMileage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, warning_hour = #{warningHour,jdbcType=INTEGER}, warning_status = #{warningStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filepath = #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Column_1 = #{column1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Column_2 = #{column2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Column_3 = #{column3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Column_4 = #{column4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Column_5 = #{column5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: t.id, t.task_name, u2.user_id, u2.user_name, t.estimate_start_time, t.estimate_end_time, t.actual_start_time, t.actual_end_time, t.task_speed, t.status, t.abnormal_status, t.task_type, t.task_mileage, t.priority, u3.user_id, u3.user_name, u1.user_id, u1.user_name, t.assign_time
mapper.select:
select
from task t LEFT JOIN platform_user u1 -- 指派人 ON t.assign_user_id = u1.user_id LEFT JOIN platform_user u2 -- 被指派人 ON t.beassign_user_id = u2.user_id LEFT JOIN platform_user u3 -- 创建人 on t.create_user_id = u3.user_id

SELECT ta.id, ta.task_name, ta.task_parent_id, ta.project_id, ta.demand_id, ta.priority, ta.assign_user_id, ta.beassign_user_id, ta.assign_time, ta.estimate_start_time, ta.estimate_end_time, ta.actual_start_time, ta.actual_end_time, ta.task_type, ta.task_speed, ta.status, ta.abnormal_status, ta.task_describe, ta.abnormal_describe, ta.estimate_hour, ta.consume_hour, ta.remain_hour, ta.task_mileage, ta.create_user_id, ta.modify_user_id, ta.create_time, ta.modify_time, ta.warning_hour, ta.warning_status, ta.comment, ta.filepath, ta.filename, ta.Column_1, ta.Column_2, ta.Column_3, ta.Column_4, ta.Column_5, de.demand_name, pro.project_name,pl.user_name AS assign_user_name, pla.user_name AS beassign_user_name FROM task ta LEFT JOIN platform_user pl ON ta.assign_user_id = pl.user_id LEFT JOIN platform_user pla ON ta.beassign_user_id = pla.user_id LEFT JOIN demand de ON ta.demand_id = de.id LEFT JOIN project_main pro ON ta.project_id = pro.id WHERE ta.status = 1 ORDER BY ta.create_time DESC, ta.priority DESC
select count(1) from task where status = 1
